name: fuel-tracker-be
description: Full Stack Open 2020, part 11 - Exercise 11.21: Own pipeline, Fuel Tracker Backend

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fuel-tracker-fe && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../fuel-tracker-be/
scripts.deploy:prepFE: cd ../fuel-tracker-fe && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../web/
scripts.deploy:prepBE: cp -r src ../web/ && cp -r package* ../web/ && cp -r Procfile ../web/
scripts.deploy: cd ../ && git subtree push --prefix web heroku master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy:cleanOld && npm run deploy:prepFE && npm run deploy:prepBE && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m 'Full deployment to Heroku' && git push && cd ./fuel-tracker-be && npm run deploy
